column5: Villa # 1 features calming and inviting decor, 2 queen 4 poster beds, a pullout sofa for 2, an over sized chair, deluxe linens, private bath with walk in shower and spa tub, large seating area with couch, kitchenette, and eat in bar. Kitchenette includes all dishes, outdoor grill tools, and serving ware needed. MAX OCCUPANCY 6. All Villas provide free Wifi, Cable TV, private coffee bar, toiletries, plush robes, private entrance, parking, and access to the tasting room within walking distance.
